metadata.name: Blood Collar
metadata.description:
Dear God...... What have you done?

No one is perfect. We all have wounds. There are stigmas. Some wounds are created by someone who binds us and it will stay with us forever. 

My face is wounded. There survived the blood flowing from my eyes and mouth. My tears have dried up. Even the bandage on my neck still full of blood And of course it's like a collar.

4000 x 4500 px.
16.34 MB

Hand-Draw Art by 
CZY_Justczy
